ProductInfo.Features:
4.0-Inch Touchscreen, Scratch resistant glass, Sony Whitemagic Technology, Sony Mobile Bravia Engine, Timescape UI
8MP Camera, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face and smile detection, 3D sweep panorama, image stabilization
1080p at 30fps, continuous autofocus, video light
Android OS v2.3(Gingerbread), NovaThor U8500, Dual-Core 1 GHz Cortex A9, 16GB internal memory
Stereo FM Radio with RDS, MP4/MP3, Wi-Fi, A-GPS support, Organizer, Document viewer, Voice memo/dial/commands
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Xperia P LT22I Android OS v2.3 Cellphone with 4.0-Inch Touchscreen, 8MP Camera, 1080p Video Recording, Wi-Fi and A-GPS Support - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Black
